categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A male stormtrooper, he served in the Stormtrooper Corps during the time of the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance.

In 0 BBY, he was stationed onboard the Death Star where he led a patrol towards Docking Control Room 327 which is ran by Lieutenant Pol Treidum. After losing contact from Treidum, the stormtrooper found the door to the control room locked and demanded anyone inside to open it. He then ordered his troopers to have unlock the doors and make a full sweep across the control room. Finding nothing, he and his troops heard the sound of knocking from a closet and found the droids C-3PO and R2-D2, who were pretending that they were being locked away by rebels. Not knowing that these were the droids the Empire was looking for, the officer ordered his patrol to move towards Level 5 and left one stormtrooper to stay on guard of the control room.
